name: Pawe≈Ç Kajanek
summary: I'm a young frontend developer with 3 years of working experience. In my previous jobs I took part in creating new features as well as migrating and fixing the existing ones using React and Vue. The projects I worked on were managed mainly with agile methodologies. In the future I aim to continue developing my frontend skills, but also to start learning backend skills and technologies and become more of a Fullstack Developer.

responsibilities: Creating form pages with input validation (FE and BE)
Creating various widgets for data display, preference customization and query applying
Creating automated tests for UI components
Fetching and parsing data from API endpoints
Migrating widgets from Backbone.js to React.js
Attending daily standup, retro and review meetings held in English
Writing minor API endpoints for "User Dashboard" data
Migrating "Pricing" page from Vanilla to Vue
Fixing various bugs in browser builder app

projects.name: Advent of Code
projects.description: Repository storing my solutions for "Advent of Code". Written using Python, C# and Go.

projects.name: Claymore Roomba
projects.description: Web browser implementation of "Minesweeper" game, build to explore automated solver. Written using React.
